description: We are aiming to do four free guided tours that are normally paid with which we can offer max up to 25 people on each. We will also have drop in talks run by the Visitor and Sales team on specific subjects for people to drop into.

factsheet.heading: National Maritime Museum
paragraphs: Nelson’s uniform, items from the Titanic and polar relics: the National Maritime Museum is a treasure trove of objects, stories and memories.
But with so much to see, where to begin? Our daily tours and gallery talks are the perfect way to discover the must-see highlights of the Museum, all led by our knowledgeable guides.
Marvel at the detail of Nelson’s coat, worn when he was fatally wounded at the Battle of Trafalgar; meet a Fijian canoe and get up close to a ship model nearly 4,000 years old.
Come to the museum and listen to our team share stories of items in the collection.

name: National Maritime Museum
